entry.title: Octopress setup
entry.content:
Setting up Octopress has been quite easy and straightforward following the documentation. The only slight problem I found was with regard the deployment to github. The first step there for deploying with a Github user / organization is:

rake setup_github_pages

This script ask you for your Github repository url. From the documentation it could seem that they were referring to the Pages url http://albertovilla.github.com. If you use that as the URL you will find a strange error (the error description will not provide you any hint on the real issue).

Once I used the right URL git@github.com:albertovilla/albertovilla.github.com.git everything went fine.
